PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-05702017-06-02,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC,  HC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectMicrobeads in Toiletries Regulations
PrecisMICROBEADS IN TOILETRIES REGULATIONS in order to contribute to the protection of the environment by reducing the quantity of plastic microbeads entering Canadian freshwater and marine ecosystems by prohibiting the manufacture, import, and sale of toiletries that contain plastic microbeads, including non-prescription drugs and natural health products.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0111 Publication Date: 2017-06-14
AttachmentsAttachment
